name: Mathcad Worksheet File
summary: Learn about .XMCD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Mathcad was originally developed by Mathsoft, which was acquired by Parametric Technology Corporation in 2006.

description: XML-based worksheet created with Mathcad, an engineering calculation program developed by Parametric Technology Corporation (PTC); may contain both math and text elements.
